Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Joe K.
Reviews.Content: This laptop is a work horse and survives and thrives in fairly harsh environments. Laptop arrived well packaged and working as described. Harddrive was not set correct in bios and was causing blue screen, but I will assume it was not intentional. easy fix and all is well.Thanks

Reviews.Title: On time!
Reviews.Author: Angela L. Hilliard
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I received everything that was stated.  I wanted a decent computer and I couldn't afford a brand new one.  I knew HP computers are reliable.  The determining factor for this purchase was getting the codes for the software and computer and the price.  I did my research on other used computers and I came across this one during my search. I am very pleased with my purchase.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: As is promised
Reviews.Author: Kent G. Stannard "Kent"
Reviews.Content: Nice drama free purchase didn't care for windows anyway so put some old fashioned Ubuntu on and seems to work in all of the appropriate ways. One screw was loose but able to simply screw back in

Reviews.Title: Came as promised
Reviews.Author: Tofubandito
Reviews.Content: Overall pleased with the computer. Came as described with minor scratches and scuffs. Would have been 5 stars however, mine came with all of the keyboard screws loose. Whoever did the refurb obviously did not tighten things up.

Reviews.Title: A nice replacement for my old laptop
Reviews.Author: SteveW
Reviews.Content: This laptop is a great replacement for my old laptop.It runs fast, has all the bells and whistles that the newones have, and came with Windows 7 which I prefer.
